Recommendations: Since the resume exceeds **two pages**, consider condensing the content by prioritizing the most relevant information for the target job. Focus on quantifiable achievements and impactful responsibilities to showcase your expertise effectively.

While your skills section is comprehensive, consider structuring it more strategically. Categorize skills by proficiency level (e.g., expert, proficient, familiar) to provide a clearer picture of your capabilities and ensure relevant skills are easily identifiable.

Enhance your summary by quantifying your accomplishments with data-driven metrics. Providing specific numbers or percentages to highlight your impact will make your summary more compelling and showcase your ability to drive tangible results.

In the Education section, include **relevant coursework or extracurricular activities** that align with your career goals. This provides additional context and demonstrates your commitment to continuous learning and development in your field.

Refine the descriptions of your work experience by focusing on the **most relevant achievements** and using action verbs to showcase your contributions. Tailor each description to align with the requirements of the job you are applying for, highlighting your most impactful accomplishments.

Ensure the **formatting is consistent** throughout the resume. Consistent font styles, spacing, and section headings enhance readability and create a polished, professional impression. Proofread carefully to eliminate any inconsistencies.
